concept.title: PGI 237.102-76 Review criteria for the acquisition of services.

conbody.p: The tenets of the DoD-wide architecture for the acquisition of services along with the associated review criteria are available here. These matrices are to be used when conducting reviews in the preaward phase (Review/Approval of Acquisition Strategies or Preaward Peer Reviews) and in the postaward phase (Postaward Peer Reviews). See DFARS 201.170, Peer reviews, and PGI 201.170 , Peer reviews.
